name: Witchball (itch) (DuckDuckGrem)
description:
Play as little witch Aqua and smite your enemies (or your friends!) with flying fireballs in this witchy remake of an arcade classic. 

Witchball offers two different play modes: single- and two-player. Single-player uses the "W" and "S" keys to move. Two-player uses "W" and "S" keys for player 1 (Aqua) & up and down arrow keys for player 2 (Red). 

The witch sprites features in Witchball come from 9E0's Witches Pack (right here on itch). A lot of this game was inspired by the aesthetic of the witches, so it's safe to say I truly couldn't have made this without 9E0's asset pack! 

Everything else in Witchball was created by me, and I'm not quite done with it. I have a few more features in mind (including, but not limited to, levels and special attacks!) that I'd like to implement before I mark this project complete. There's also a fair bit already done that could use some more polishing!

It'd mean a lot to me if you'd leave a comment with your feedback and followed me here or on my socials (linked below). And if you really liked the game (or just want the warm fuzzy feeling of supporting a solo indie dev), you can click the support button above! 

Either way, thank you so much for reading this far and for checking out my game  ✨🤗✨

Hope to see you around for Witchball's next update, coming December 21st! (And for all of the projects that come after that 😉)
